Dubai.description: Dubai dazzles with futuristic architecture, luxury shopping, desert adventures, and world-class attractions. Experience the jewel of the Middle East.

top_attractions.name: Burj Khalifa
top_attractions.detail: World's tallest building with breathtaking city views from observation decks.

top_attractions.name: Dubai Mall
top_attractions.detail: World's largest shopping mall with aquarium and fountain shows.

top_attractions.name: Palm Jumeirah
top_attractions.detail: Artificial island with luxury resorts and Atlantis waterpark.

top_attractions.name: Desert Safari
top_attractions.detail: Thrilling dune bashing and traditional Bedouin camp experiences.

top_attractions.name: Dubai Marina
top_attractions.detail: Modern waterfront district with skyscrapers and yacht clubs.

top_attractions.name: Gold Souk
top_attractions.detail: Traditional market with world's largest collection of gold jewelry.

top_attractions.name: Miracle Garden
top_attractions.detail: World's largest natural flower garden with stunning floral displays.

top_attractions.name: Dubai Frame
top_attractions.detail: Iconic architectural landmark offering panoramic city views.

packages.name: Budget Package
packages.detail: Round-trip flights, 3-star hotel, Daily breakfast, City tours included. Perfect Dubai introduction.

packages.name: Standard Package
packages.detail: Flights, 4-star hotel, Half board meals, Desert safari included. Great Dubai experience.

packages.name: Luxury Package
packages.detail: Business class flights, 5-star hotels, All meals, Private tours. Premium Dubai luxury.

packages.name: Custom Package
packages.detail: Choose experiences, Select hotels, Flexible duration, Custom activities. Your Dubai adventure.

why_choose_us.title: Modern Marvels
why_choose_us.detail: Experience world's tallest buildings and futuristic architecture.

why_choose_us.title: Luxury Shopping
why_choose_us.detail: Shop at world's largest malls and traditional gold souks.

why_choose_us.title: Desert Adventures
why_choose_us.detail: Enjoy thrilling desert safaris and Bedouin experiences.

why_choose_us.title: Cultural Heritage
why_choose_us.detail: Discover rich Arabian culture and traditions.

why_choose_us.title: World-Class Attractions
why_choose_us.detail: Visit theme parks, beaches, and entertainment destinations.

why_choose_us.title: Culinary Excellence
why_choose_us.detail: Taste international cuisine and traditional Arabic flavors.

guides.name: Ahmed Hassan
guides.title: Cultural Heritage Expert
guides.description: 15+ years experience in cultural heritage and history. Licensed guide specializing in local traditions and cultural experiences.

guides.name: Mariyam Ali
guides.title: Adventure & Desert Guide
guides.description: Expert adventure guide with extensive knowledge of desert safaris, dune bashing, and outdoor activities. Fluent in multiple languages.

guides.name: Captain Ibrahim
guides.title: Marine & Water Sports Expert
guides.description: Professional marine guide specializing in water sports, boat tours, and coastal adventures. Expert in marine safety and activities.

testimonials.name: Sunil Sharma
testimonials.review: Dubai's skyline impressed us greatly. The view from Burj Khalifa was absolutely amazing and breathtaking.

testimonials.name: Priya Agarwal
testimonials.review: Desert safari experience was thrilling. We got to see both Dubai's luxury and traditional culture beautifully.

testimonials.name: Rajesh Verma
testimonials.review: From shopping to adventure, everything was perfect. Oasis Tours arrangement was excellent and professional!

testimonials.name: Kavita Jain
testimonials.review: Palm Jumeirah and Atlantis were incredible. Dubai's modern architecture and luxury exceeded all expectations.

testimonials.name: Amit Kumar
testimonials.review: Gold Souk shopping and Dubai Fountain show were magical. The blend of tradition and modernity was fascinating.

Turkey.description: Turkey bridges Europe and Asia with rich history, stunning landscapes, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. Discover where East meets West.

top_attractions.name: Hagia Sophia Istanbul
top_attractions.detail: Iconic Byzantine cathedral turned mosque with stunning architecture.

top_attractions.name: Cappadocia
top_attractions.detail: Unique landscape with fairy chimneys and hot air balloons.

top_attractions.name: Pamukkale
top_attractions.detail: Natural thermal pools with white travertine terraces.

top_attractions.name: Ephesus
top_attractions.detail: Ancient Greek city with well-preserved Roman ruins.

packages.name: Budget Package
packages.detail: Flights, 3-star hotels, Breakfast, Major attractions. Great Turkey introduction.

packages.name: Standard Package
packages.detail: Flights, 4-star hotels, Half board, Multi-city tours. Perfect Turkey experience.

packages.name: Luxury Package
packages.detail: Business class, 5-star hotels, All meals, Private guides. Premium Turkey luxury.

packages.name: Custom Package
packages.detail: Flexible itinerary, Choose regions, Custom experiences. Your Turkey adventure.

why_choose_us.title: Rich History
why_choose_us.detail: Explore Byzantine, Ottoman, and ancient Greek heritage.

why_choose_us.title: Unique Landscapes
why_choose_us.detail: Experience Cappadocia's fairy chimneys and Pamukkale's terraces.

why_choose_us.title: Cultural Bridge
why_choose_us.detail: Discover the fascinating blend of European and Asian cultures.

why_choose_us.title: Culinary Delights
why_choose_us.detail: Taste authentic Turkish cuisine and famous sweets.

why_choose_us.title: Adventure Activities
why_choose_us.detail: Enjoy hot air ballooning, thermal baths, and boat cruises.

why_choose_us.title: Warm Hospitality
why_choose_us.detail: Experience famous Turkish friendliness and service.

testimonials.name: Priya Joshi
testimonials.review: Cappadocia में hot air balloon ride lifetime का experience था। Turkey की history और culture amazing है।

testimonials.name: Vikram Singh
testimonials.review: Istanbul के Hagia Sophia से लेकर Pamukkale के thermal pools तक, हर जगह incredible थी।

testimonials.name: Neha Agarwal
testimonials.review: Turkish food और hospitality का जो experience मिला, वो unforgettable है। Oasis Tours का planning excellent!
